name: docthis
description: Automatically generates detailed JSDoc comments in TypeScript and JavaScript files.

docthis.includeTypes.description: When enabled, type information is added to comment tags.

docthis.includeMemberOfOnClassMembers.description: When enabled, memberOf information is added to comment tags on class members.

docthis.includeMemberOfOnInterfaceMember.description: When enabled, memberOf information is added to comment tags on interface members.

docthis.includeDescriptionTag.description: When enabled, JSDoc comments for functions and methods will include @description.

docthis.enableHungarianNotationEvaluatio.description: When enabled, hungarian notation will be used as a type hint.

docthis.inferTypesFromNames.description: When enabled, will use names of params & methods as type hints.

docthis.includeAuthorTag.description: When enabled, will add the @author tag.

docthis.includeSinceTag.description: When enabled, will add the @since tag

docthis.alwaysIncludeSince.description: When enabled, will ALWAYS include @since tag, instead of only in public

docthis.authorName.default: (Set the text for this tag by adding docthis.authorName to your settings file.)
docthis.authorName.description: When docthis.includeAuthorTag is enabled, will add @author tag with this value.

docthis.includeDateTag.description: When enabled, will add the @date tag in DD-MM-YYYY

docthis.dateTagFormat.description: Select date format. Defaults to DD-MM-YYYY

docthis.inlineOneLiners.description: When enabled, comments that only have one line, will be displayed in one line instead of three.
